add.semantics: Performs reg3 = reg1 + reg2. If the computation overflows, then the overflow flag is set

subtract.semantics: Performs reg3 = reg1 - reg2. In case reg2 > reg1, 0 is written to reg3 and overflow flag is set

move immediate.semantics: Performs reg1 = $Imm where Imm is a 8 bit value.

load.semantics: Loads data from mem_addr into reg1.

store.semantics: Stores data from reg1 to mem_addr.

multiply.semantics: Performs reg3 = reg1 x reg2. If the computation overflows, then the overflow flag is set.

divide.semantics: Performs reg3/reg4 stores the quotient in R0 and the remainder in R1.
